'''''Sic Transit Gloria Mundi''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Legatus Golem]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The Latin phrase {{Lang|la={{w|sic transit gloria mundi}}|la_tl=thus passes worldy glory|mini=1}} was used in {{w|papal coronation}} ceremonies from 1409 to 1963.
